articles.content:
Congratulations to Togolese President 
    Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Friday sent a congratulatory message to Faure Gnassingbe on his election as president of Togo.
 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop on good terms, Kim sincerely wished Gnassingbe big success in his noble work for peace and prosperity of the country.

DPRK Delegations Leave
    Pyongyang, April 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Information Committee led by its Vice-Chairman Ri Ju Gwan to visit Cambodia and Laos and a delegation of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League led by Secretary of its Central Committee Jang Yong Chol to visit Laos left here Saturday.
